author: undetermined
full_text:
Virat Kohli Unfollows Pat Cummins On Instagram After World Cup Final? Viral Claim Is False

Claim:
Indian cricketer Virat Kohli unfollows Australian cricket captain Pat Cummins on Instagram after Australia beat India by six wickets for their sixth ICC Cricket World Cup title in Ahmedabad.

Fact:
Newschecker looked up Virat Kohli's Instagram profile, where we saw that he was still following the Australian cricket captain's account, as of November 23, 2023, four days after the final on November 19, 2023. We saw that Cummins also follows Kohli on Instagram, confirming that the viral claim was false.

Result: False

Source: Virat Kohli's Instagram profile

Additional Information:
- The fact-check was written by Kushel HM and edited by Chayan Kundu
- Published on November 23, 2023
- The article thoroughly investigated the claim by directly checking the Instagram accounts of both cricketers
- Screenshots of the Instagram profiles were provided as evidence
title: Fact: We looked up Virat Kohli’s Instagram profile, where we saw that he was still following the Australian cricket captain’s account.
vclaim: Social media users falsely claimed that Virat Kohli unfollowed Pat Cummins on Instagram after India's loss to Australia in the 2023 Cricket World Cup final.
